summary: Cleans up the blood and guts in the Volkihar Keep dining hall.
descriptionHtml:
Bethesda once again proves they are the masters of subtlety.

This mod simply removes most of the blood splatters and all the human remains, including the two cadavers on the tables, from the dining area in Volkihar Keep because LOL EVIL CANNIBAL VAMPIRES is dumb and seriously, didn\'t your mother teach you to clean up after yourself?

Have some class, Harkon.

...

Use only one version.

\"Version A\" only removes the gratuitous blood splatters and human remains from the immediate dining hall area.

\"Version B\" does what A does in addition to removing the the bone piles from the area and cleaning up the blood splatters in the chalice room.

\"Version C\" does what B does in addition to replacing the bloody casks with non-bloody ones.

This mod only affects the dining hall area. I have no intention cleaning up the rest of the castle as it doesn\'t bug me like the dining hall did. Harkon doesn\'t strike me as the most balanced individual (what, with him being a devout follower of Molag Bal and all) and what he does in the privacy of his own bedroom is his business only.

Anyone is free to take this mod and do whatever they want with it. No permission is needed and no credit needs to be given.
author: Upmarket Mango
